title: 08/08: Quarterbacks Preview (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
With the QB position being as deep as it has ever been, you should feel free to wait to draft your starter. However, there comes a point in each draft when you should pounce on an elite QB, and we'll tell you when that point is. We start with basic QB questions (2:40) detailing our strategies in different formats before getting into every relevant QB with sneaky stats that should help you evaluate players ... QB schedules to know about (13:10), auction values, plus sleepers (20:40), breakouts (24:24) and busts (31:40) ... Good debates on Carson Wentz, Jimmy Garoppolo, Dak Prescott, Tom Brady and more, and we've got a thorough breakdown of Average Draft Position (41:41) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
